itunes:title: #257 - Project Management and Building Systems for Creatives and Freelancers with Mary Williams
title: #257 - Project Management and Building Systems for Creatives and Freelancers with Mary Williams
description:
Project management is an important skillset for entrepreneurs – it's the work that will allow you to take a big idea and turn it into reality. But as business owners in the modern age, we tend to think of project management not as the skillset, but as the tool, the shiny piece of software that we believe will lessen the load. In reality, without understanding the basics of project management and of the systems and processes that make up your business, the software will not help, as Mary Williams presents in this episode, along with some non-tech practices for discovering how you need to project manage, and yes – the best software and technology for bringing your processes into the digital age.


Get full shownotes for this episode here >>

—
